mapper.select: select name from briup_clazz where id=#{clazz_id}
select name from briup_department where id=#{department_id}
select name from briup_course where id=#{course_id}
select name from briup_teacher where id=#{user_id}
select name from briup_questionnaire where id=#{questionnaire_id}

select a.* from briup_survey a where a.clazz_id in (select id from briup_clazz where name like #{word}) or a.course_id in (select id from briup_course where name like #{word}) or a.department_id in (select id from briup_department where name like #{word}) or a.questionnaire_id in(select id from briup_questionnaire where name like #{word}) or a.user_id in (select id from briup_teacher where name like #{word})
mapper.update: update briup_survey set code=#{code},status="开启" where id=#{id}
update briup_survey set status="结束" where id=#{id}
